name: Laws of UX: Reference Cards
description:
This library brings Jon Yablonski's Laws of UX to the Figma Community.


Source: lawsofux.com


Version 1.0

  • 2 Laws of UX components
  • 21 official Laws of UX variants per component
  • Each card contains a link to the relevant source on lawsofux.com
